CreateMmsDataSource.title: CreateMmsDataSource
CreateMmsDataSource.summary: Creates a data source to migrate data to MaxCompute using MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA).

CreateMmsFetchMetadataJob.title: CreateMmsFetchMetadataJob
CreateMmsFetchMetadataJob.summary: Creates a job to pull metadata from a data source.

CreateRole.title: CreateRole
CreateRole.summary: Creates a role at the MaxCompute project level.

DeleteMmsDataSource.title: DeleteMmsDataSource
DeleteMmsDataSource.summary: Deletes a MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA) data source and its associated migration plans and metadata.

DeleteMmsJob.title: DeleteMmsJob
DeleteMmsJob.summary: Deletes a MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA) data migration plan.

DeleteProject.title: DeleteProject
DeleteProject.summary: Deletes a MaxCompute project. This operation is irreversible. Use this API with caution.

GetComputeQuotaPlan.title: GetComputeQuotaPlan
GetComputeQuotaPlan.summary: Get detailed information of a single compute quota plan.

GetComputeQuotaSchedule.title: GetComputeQuotaSchedule
GetComputeQuotaSchedule.summary: Displays the time-specific configuration of compute quota.

GetJobInfo.title: GetJobInfo
GetJobInfo.summary: Queries the basic information about a job.

GetJobResourceUsage.title: GetJobResourceUsage
GetJobResourceUsage.summary: Performs statistics on all jobs that are complete on a specified day and obtains the total resource usage of each job executor on a daily basis.

GetMmsAsyncTask.title: GetMmsAsyncTask
GetMmsAsyncTask.summary: Retrieves a single asynchronous task from MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA).

GetMmsDataSource.title: GetMmsDataSource
GetMmsDataSource.summary: Retrieves the details of a single MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA) data source.

GetMmsDb.title: GetMmsDb
GetMmsDb.summary: Retrieves a database from a MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA) data source.

GetMmsFetchMetadataJob.title: GetMmsFetchMetadataJob
GetMmsFetchMetadataJob.summary: Retrieves the details of a MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA) job that fetches metadata.

GetMmsJob.title: GetMmsJob
GetMmsJob.summary: Retrieves the details of a specific MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA) migration plan.

GetMmsPartition.title: GetMmsPartition
GetMmsPartition.summary: Retrieves a partition from a MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA) data source.

GetMmsTable.title: GetMmsTable
GetMmsTable.summary: Retrieves a table from a MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA) data source.

GetMmsTask.title: GetMmsTask
GetMmsTask.summary: Retrieves the details of a specific migration task.

GetPackage.title: GetPackage
GetPackage.summary: Obtains the information about a package.

GetProject.title: GetProject
GetProject.summary: Queries the basic information about a MaxCompute project.

GetQuota.title: GetQuota
GetQuota.summary: Retrieve information for the specified level-1 quota group. Warning: This operation will be decommissioned on July 31, 2024. It will be replaced by the `QueryQuota` operation. The request parameters, response parameters, and features of the two operations are the same.

GetQuotaPlan.title: GetQuotaPlan
GetQuotaPlan.summary: Obtains the information of a quota plan.

GetQuotaSchedule.title: GetQuotaSchedule
GetQuotaSchedule.summary: Obtains the scheduling plan for a quota plan.

GetRoleAcl.title: GetRoleAcl
GetRoleAcl.summary: Obtains the ACL-based permissions that is granted to a project-level role.

GetRoleAclOnObject.title: GetRoleAclOnObject
GetRoleAclOnObject.summary: Obtains ACL-based permissions on an object that are granted to a project-level role.

GetRolePolicy.title: GetRolePolicy
GetRolePolicy.summary: Obtains the policy that is attached to a project-level role.

GetRunningJobs.title: GetRunningJobs
GetRunningJobs.summary: Obtains the running state data of jobs that are in the running state in a specified period of time.

GetStorageAmountSummary.title: GetStorageAmountSummary
GetStorageAmountSummary.summary: Retrieves a summary of the total storage amount.

GetStorageSizeSummary.title: GetStorageSizeSummary
GetStorageSizeSummary.summary: Retrieves a summary of storage usage.

GetStorageSummaryCompared.title: GetStorageSummaryCompared
GetStorageSummaryCompared.summary: Retrieves the year-on-year (YoY) change in storage usage.

GetTableInfo.title: GetTableInfo
GetTableInfo.summary: Views the information about MaxCompute internal tables, views, external tables, clustered tables, or transactional tables.

GetTrustedProjects.title: GetTrustedProjects
GetTrustedProjects.summary: Obtains the trusted projects of the current project.

ListComputeMetricsByInstance.title: ListComputeMetricsByInstance
ListComputeMetricsByInstance.summary: Queries a list of computing resources used by a pay-as-you-go job.

ListFunctions.title: ListFunctions
ListFunctions.summary: Obtains functions in a MaxCompute project.

ListJobMetric.title: ListJobMetric
ListJobMetric.summary: Queries a performance metric of the job that is complete.

ListJobSnapshotInfos.title: ListJobSnapshotInfos
ListJobSnapshotInfos.summary: Retrieves job snapshot data at a specific point in time.

ListMmsDataSources.title: ListMmsDataSources
ListMmsDataSources.summary: Lists the MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA) data sources.

ListMmsDbs.title: ListMmsDbs
ListMmsDbs.summary: Lists the databases in a MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA) data source.

ListMmsJobs.title: ListMmsJobs
ListMmsJobs.summary: Retrieves a list of migration jobs.

ListMmsPartitions.title: ListMmsPartitions
ListMmsPartitions.summary: Lists the partitions in a MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA) data source.

ListMmsTables.title: ListMmsTables
ListMmsTables.summary: Lists the tables in a MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA) data source.

ListMmsTaskLogs.title: ListMmsTaskLogs
ListMmsTaskLogs.summary: Lists the execution logs for a specific migration task.

ListMmsTasks.title: ListMmsTasks
ListMmsTasks.summary: Retrieves a list of migration tasks.

ListPackages.title: ListPackages
ListPackages.summary: Queries the packages in a MaxCompute project.

ListProjectUsers.title: ListProjectUsers
ListProjectUsers.summary: Queries a list of users in a project.

ListProjects.title: ListProjects
ListProjects.summary: Queries a list of MaxCompute projects.

ListResources.title: ListResources
ListResources.summary: Obtains resources in a MaxCompute project.

ListStoragePartitionsInfo.title: ListStoragePartitionsInfo
ListStoragePartitionsInfo.summary: Queries the storage details of a specific partition in a partitioned table in a MaxCompute project.

ListStorageProjectsInfo.title: ListStorageProjectsInfo
ListStorageProjectsInfo.summary: Retrieves the storage details of projects.

ListStorageTablesInfo.title: ListStorageTablesInfo
ListStorageTablesInfo.summary: Queries the table storage details of a MaxCompute project.

ListTables.title: ListTables
ListTables.summary: Obtains tables in a MaxCompute project.

ListTunnelQuotaTimer.title: ListTunnelQuotaTimer
ListTunnelQuotaTimer.summary: Displays the time-specific configuration of an exclusive resource group for Tunnel (referred to as Tunnel quota).

ListUsers.title: ListUsers
ListUsers.summary: Obtains users in a MaxCompute project.

ListUsersByRole.title: ListUsersByRole
ListUsersByRole.summary: Obtains information about the users who are assigned a project-level role.

QueryQuota.title: QueryQuota
QueryQuota.summary: Queries the information about a specified level-1 quota group.

QueryQuotaMetric.title: QueryQuotaMetric
QueryQuotaMetric.summary: Queries the time series data of resource consumption for a quota.

QueryStorageMetric.title: QueryStorageMetric
QueryStorageMetric.summary: Queries time-series metrics of data storage.

QueryTunnelMetric.title: QueryTunnelMetric
QueryTunnelMetric.summary: Queries metric data for the Tunnel Data Transmission Service within a specified time range.

QueryTunnelMetricDetail.title: QueryTunnelMetricDetail
QueryTunnelMetricDetail.summary: Queries detailed data for the Tunnel Data Transmission Service within a specified time range.

SumStorageMetricsByDate.title: SumStorageMetricsByDate
SumStorageMetricsByDate.summary: Retrieves the storage information for each category or project on a specified date.

UpdateComputeQuotaSchedule.title: UpdateComputeQuotaSchedule
UpdateComputeQuotaSchedule.summary: Updates the time-based schedule for a computing quota.

UpdateComputeSubQuota.title: UpdateComputeSubQuota
UpdateComputeSubQuota.summary: Updates the basic configuration of a MaxCompute quota. For example, you can call this operation to add or delete a level-2 quota, define the basic attributes of a level-2 quota, and define the configuration of compute units (CUs) for a quota plan that is in effect.

UpdateMmsDataSource.title: UpdateMmsDataSource
UpdateMmsDataSource.summary: Refreshes the metadata of a MaxCompute Migration Assist (MMA) data source.

UpdatePackage.title: UpdatePackage
UpdatePackage.summary: Updates the objects in a package and projects in which the package can be installed.

UpdateProjectBasicMeta.title: UpdateProjectBasicMeta
UpdateProjectBasicMeta.summary: Modifies the basic information of a project.

UpdateProjectDefaultQuota.title: UpdateProjectDefaultQuota
UpdateProjectDefaultQuota.summary: Updates the default computing quota of a project.

UpdateProjectIpWhiteList.title: UpdateProjectIpWhiteList
UpdateProjectIpWhiteList.summary: Modifies the IP address whitelist of a MaxCompute project.

UpdateProjectModelTier.title: UpdateProjectModelTier
UpdateProjectModelTier.summary: Upgrades a project's Layer 2 model to a Layer 3 model.

UpdateQuotaSchedule.title: UpdateQuotaSchedule
UpdateQuotaSchedule.summary: Updates the scheduling plan for a quota plan.

UpdateTunnelQuotaTimer.title: UpdateTunnelQuotaTimer
UpdateTunnelQuotaTimer.summary: Updates the time-based auto-scaling configuration for an exclusive resource group for Data Transmission Service (Tunnel Quota).

UpdateUsersToRole.title: UpdateUsersToRole
UpdateUsersToRole.summary: Adds or removes users from a project role.
